metadata.scriptContent: yarn run lint:code && yarn run lint:test
STATUS=$(git status --porcelain); echo $STATUS; if [ -z "$STATUS" ]; then yarn version; fi
NODE_ENV=testing c8 --include index.js --include lib --check-coverage --100  --reporter text --reporter cobertura -- mocha --reporter dot './test/**/*.test.js'
yarn lint:code && yarn lint:test && yarn lint:translations
yarn translate:ghost && yarn translate:portal && yarn translate:signup-form && yarn translate:comments && yarn translate:search && node generate-context.js
yarn run lint:code && yarn run lint:test
yarn run lint:code && yarn run lint:test
yarn test:unit && yarn test:integration && yarn test:e2e && yarn lint
yarn lint:server && yarn lint:shared && yarn lint:frontend
yarn lint:server && yarn lint:shared && yarn lint:frontend && yarn lint:test && yarn lint:types
